parameters.name: Dimensions
parameters.description: The dimensions of the metric that you want to query.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: IntervalInSec
parameters.description: The time interval at which you want to query metric data. Unit: milliseconds. Minimum value: 60000.

parameters.name: Measures
parameters.description: The measures of the metric that you want to query.

parameters.name: Metric
parameters.description: The metric that you want to query. You cannot specify a custom metric. For more information, see the "Application monitoring metrics that can be queried" section.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The order in which measures are sorted. Valid values:

*   `ASC`: ascending order
*   `DESC`: descending order

> If you do not specify the parameter, data is not sorted.

parameters.name: OrderBy
parameters.description: The dimension for arranging metrics in sequence. For more information, see the supplementary metrics.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: This parameter is no longer supported. The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start of the time range to query. Unit: milliseconds.
